name: ZX BASIC Wars
description:
ZX BASIC Wars

Fantasy strategy war game in ZX Spectrum Basic

A game made in a few days for the ZX SPECTRUM BASIC GAME JAM.

Destroy all the enemy troops to win.

You get gifts if you capture castles and villages heal you.

Land def scores are important as troops don't have def stats
mountains and castles have the highest level. 

Have fun!
